trans-unit.source: Defines methods for writing <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage"></xref> parts to an XPS document.
Adds a new <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsColorContext"></xref> to the current page.

<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedPageWriter.AddColorContext%2A> adds a new <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsColorContext> to the document package and associates it with the current <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage>.
The new color context resource that was added.
<xref href="System.IDisposable.Dispose"></xref> has been called.
Adds a new <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsFont"></xref> to the current page.

<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedPageWriter.AddFont%2A> adds a new <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsFont> to the document package and associates it with the current <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage>.
The new font resource that was added.
<xref href="System.IDisposable.Dispose"></xref> has been called.
Adds a new obfuscated <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsFont"></xref> to the current page.

<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedPageWriter.AddFont%2A> adds a new <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsFont> with optional obfuscation to the document package and associates it with the current <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage>.
Set the `obfuscate` parameter to `true` when you are legally obligated to obfuscate a licensed proprietary font.
While obfuscation does not encrypt the font, it inhibits unzipping proprietary fonts and installing them separately for other uses.

For more information about font obfuscation, see Section 2.1.7.3 "Embedded Font Obfuscation" in the *XML Paper Specification (XPS)* available for download at [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761).
`true` to obfuscate the font; otherwise, `false`.
The new font resource that was added.
<xref href="System.IDisposable.Dispose"></xref> has been called.
Adds a new obfuscated or restricted <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsFont"></xref> to the current page.

<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedPageWriter.AddFont%2A> adds a new <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsFont> with optional obfuscation or restrictions to the document package, and associates it with the current <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage>.
Set the `obfuscate` parameter to `true` when you are legally obligated to obfuscate a licensed proprietary font.
While obfuscation does not encrypt the font, it inhibits unzipping proprietary fonts and installing them separately for other uses.

For more information about font obfuscation and the use of restricted fonts see the *XML Paper Specification (XPS)* available for download at [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761).
`true` to obfuscate the font; otherwise, `false`.
`true` to prevent modification of any text that uses the font; otherwise, `false`.
The new font resource that was added.
<xref href="System.IDisposable.Dispose"></xref> has been called.
Adds a new <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsImage"></xref> with a specified [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_mime](~/includes/tla2sharptla-mime-md.md)] type to the current page.

<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedPageWriter.AddImage%2A> adds a new <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsImage> with a specified `mimeType` to the document package and associates it with the current <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage>.
The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_mime](~/includes/tla2sharptla-mime-md.md)] type of the image to add.
The new image resource that was added to the page
<xref href="System.IDisposable.Dispose"></xref> has been called.
mimeType is `null`.
mimeType is an empty string.
Adds a new <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsImage"></xref> with a specified <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsImageType"></xref> to the current page.

<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedPageWriter.AddImage%2A> adds a new <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsImage> with the specified <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsImageType> to the document package and associates it with the current <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage>.
For example, `imageType` can be <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsImageType.JpegImageType> or <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsImageType.PngImageType>.
to add a JPEG or PNG <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsImage>, respectively.
The type of image to add to the page.
The new image resource that was added to the page
<xref href="System.IDisposable.Dispose"></xref> has been called.
Adds a new <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsResource"></xref> to the current page.

<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedPageWriter.AddResource%2A> adds a new <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsResource> to the document package, and associates it with the current <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage>.
If `resourceUri` is `null`, a unique resource <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedPageWriter.Uri%2A> is automatically created.
The type of resource to add.
The absolute path of the resource to add, or `null`.
The new [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] resource that was added.
resourceType is `null`.
<xref href="System.IDisposable.Dispose"></xref> has been called.
resourceType is an empty string.
Adds a <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsResourceDictionary"></xref> to the page.

<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedPageWriter.AddResourceDictionary%2A> adds a new <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsResourceDictionary> to the document package and associates it with the current <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage>.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsResourceDictionary"></xref> that was added to the page.
<xref href="System.IDisposable.Dispose"></xref> has been called.
Adds a thumbnail image of a specified <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsImageType"></xref> to the current page.

<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedPageWriter.AddThumbnail%2A> adds a new <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsImageType> to the document package and associates it with the current <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage>.
For example, `imageType` can be <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsImageType.JpegImageType> or <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsImageType.PngImageType>.
to add a JPEG or PNG thumbnail image, respectively.
The image type of the thumbnail image to add to the page.
The new thumbnail image resource that was added.
<xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedPageWriter.AddThumbnail(System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsImageType)"></xref> has already been called to add an image thumbnail for this page.
<xref href="System.IDisposable.Dispose"></xref> has been called.
Flushes and closes the fixed-page writer.

Based on settings of <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsSerializationManager> and <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsPackagingPolicy>, such as <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.FontSubsetterCommitPolicies> and <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.PackageInterleavingOrder>, the flush operation of the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedPageWriter.Commit%2A> method may be delayed until the complete <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> is closed.
Gets a list of strings that identify the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.LinkTarget"></xref> hyperlink points that are contained in the current page.

The list of <xref:System.Windows.Documents.LinkTarget> hyperlink points is available after the page has been written and the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedPageWriter.Commit%2A> method has been called.

For information about <xref:System.Windows.Documents.LinkTarget> elements see Section 3.2.3 "\<LinkTarget> Element" in the *XML Paper Specification (XPS)* available for download at [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761).
A list of strings that identify the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.LinkTarget"></xref> hyperlink points that are contained in the page.
Gets the zero-based page number of this page.
The <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedPageWriter.PageNumber%2A> property returns the zero-based page number for this <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedPage> of the document.
(<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedPageWriter.PageNumber%2A> value of zero is the first page.)
The zero-based page number of this page.
Sets the default printing options for the page.
Gets the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of the fixed page.
The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of the fixed page.
Gets an <xref href="System.Xml.XmlWriter"></xref> for writing [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)] markup to the page.
The <xref href="System.Xml.XmlWriter"></xref> for writing [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)] markup to the page.
